Très bon jeu, portal est bourré d'humour et est très éducatif puisqu'il nous fait beaucoup réffléchir, j'ai terminé le jeu et je ne suis pas déçus de l'avoir acheté car il occupe très très bien et j'avoue qu'il pose une colle de temps en temps :P
The cake ws a lie!!!

This game is amazing. I will take you through some pros and cons, to show what is great and not great.

PROS:

-This game is funny as sometimes i would burst out in laughterl.
-Amazing gameplay. The portal gun creates so many things that you can do.
-Fantastic puzzles. The sheer amount of creativness in this game is sick. Some puzzles is very simple, otheers complicated.
-Amazing voice actors. Freaking Jk.Simmons voices a character!
-More than one soloution to puzzles. (In most of them)
-It is longer than the first one.
-Mods so the game can always be played.
-Amazing story. It is a very fun, and well written story, this game has. 
-A good concept.
-Portal two is the of the thre games where i have watched, the outro.
-Reasonable price

CONS:
-I am really bad at puzzle games, so this weren´t a problem for me, but the game might be a tad short, if you are a skilled puzzle game player.
-Sometimes i think that it is a bit tedious when you stop doing the test chambers, and come out in these big massive rooms.
-Long ass loading sceens and a lot of them

Overall Portal 2 gets a 9.5 for me. I would recommend this game to EVERYONE EVER. It is without a doubt, on my top 3 games of all time list.
Portal 2 ist ein super Spiel. Es macht noch mehr Spaß als der erste Teil und ist schön knifflig. Ich würde es jedem empfehlen.

相较于常见的FPS游戏来说，Portal 2确实让人耳目一新。
￥68对于这样一部大作来说的确不算什么[strike] 虽然我是打折时入的 [/strike]
   +丰富的关卡流程
   +层出不穷的谜题
   +引人入胜的故事情节
   +生动形象的人物设计
   +卓越的物理引擎所展现的画面与效果
   +双倍乐趣的合作模式

   ++超凡的音乐
   ++创意工坊里数不胜数的地图


   -如果硬要说什么，那就是我家的电脑太老旧不能够流畅运行全高画质
  
Portal 2填补了一代的剧情空白，其杰出足以让一代作品成为序章甚至试玩版（不过一代也很有趣就是了，我入了1+2）

Alright, I'm just going to put this out there...

This is my favorite game ever.

I'm serious. Just let me explain something to you.

I could say that I like it because of its dark sense of humor. And I would be right.

I could say that I like it because it makes you think outside the box. And I would be right.

I could say that I like it because of its storytelling. And I would be right.

I could say that I like it because it switches between funny and creepy. And I would be right. 

The point is, this game is definitely worth your time, and you ought to play it. Right now.
It's like the first Portal, only more of everything. More rooms, more mechanics, more superb writing, etc. If you enjoy videogames you will enjoy this.
Absolutely Amazing!

Edit:
This is my update 5 years later. Since first playing this game in 2015, I have played a lot of different PC games and the Portal games still continue to be my favorite games of all time. Valve did an amazing job (as usual) with the story and mechanics of these games. At this point, there is honestly no excuse for not having played these games. They can run on pretty much any PC and when they're on sale they cost about as much as a Starbucks cup of coffee. Portal can be casually beat in 1.5-2 hours, and Portal 2 takes about 8-10 hours. Please just play them, its worth your time I promise.

10/10 would potato again.
BUY IT! 11/10

NOTA:   8/10

PONTOS POSITIVOS: Jogo muito bom! Puzzles(enigmas) incríveis, jogabilidade muito boa, gostei muito, e se a pessoa terminar a campanha e quiser algo mais, ainda tem a oficina do jogo que lhe permite criar fases e jogar as fases das outras pessoas, ou seja, criatividade e possbilidades beirando ao infinito. Os elementos do jogo são muito bem empregados, basicamente você vai usar portais em puzzles com lasers, caixas e muito mais coisas, tudo em função dos portais. Quando o jogo é jogado em coop(coperação) a complexidade aumenta 1000%, os puzzles ficam muito mais interessantes e difíceis, além de ser divertido jogar em dupla. Roda em computadores muito fracos.

PONTOS NEGATIVOS: Jogabilidade do personagem restringida apenas à movimentação tridimensional, ao uso de armas de portais(apenas 2 portais por jogador) e também à possibilidade de segurar objetos, poderia ter mais coisas que o personagem poderia fazer, porém ainda sim dá pra fazer bastante coisa só com isso, acredite. Visual do cenário pobre, o que deixa o jogo muito mais objetivo e "fechado", além de mais fácil também, porque em um cenário todo branco, fica mais fácil de notar as coisas, eu sei que tem a ver com a história e tudo mais, porém tem trechos do jogo onde nem tudo é branco, e poderiam usar aquele contexto para fazer fases diferenciadas. Modo história pobre.

I love the atmosphere of the game. 5 stars.

讲两句吧。

玩法和一代没什么两样，无非就是端着一个传送枪，然后想破脑袋去解密，是第一次体验到传送枪的奇妙确实会感觉很惊艳，但是一路玩到二代还是没啥变化，惊艳感少了不少。

不过二代也有属于自己的亮点，比如整个游戏的氛围。一代除了最后一关其他都是在实验室封闭的场景内，压抑，窒息，令人抓狂，二代更进一步，将实验室和室外相结合，随处可见一种荒凉的末世气息。说到这里要提的一点就是二代的逃亡。

二代里面同样有逃亡的剧情，游戏在进展到一定程度的时候，Wheatley会打断主角在实验室内的进程，然后开辟出另外一个通道，接着主角就迈上了浩浩荡荡的逃亡之路。玩过一代的人一定会对游戏最后的逃亡部分印象深刻，本来主角只是一个中规中矩的实验体，最后却打破常规逃出生天还干掉了最后的幕后黑手。可以说如果没有最后这一段逃亡的内容，《portal》只是一个创新的解密游戏，而这段内容升华了整个《portal》。[spoiler]二代虽然也有逃亡，不过在前作的熠熠光辉下，二代的逃亡不免有些俗套。 [/spoiler]

另外，二代在剧情方面下了不少的功夫，孤寂荒凉的外环境，全自动的庞大实验室，光圈老总和其助手的爱恨情仇，GLaDOS和Wheatley的各种无间，还有许多喻示大量信息的壁画、彩蛋，喜欢剧情的朋友应该可以从中找到不少乐趣。

但是光只靠这些，还不足以支持《portal2》成为一部优秀的续作，二代最大的亮点在我看来就是双人合作部分，双人合作部分当真是好玩，你必须和你的同伴一起，开着语音，互相吐槽，带着脑子去玩，这样才能充分体会到合作的快感。
能让我一次性玩7小时的游戏不多见……根本停不下来

A decent puzzle game with great audiovisuals and story (for a puzzle game). I recommend it to everyone, even those who dislike puzzle games.
